actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 1902 of title 38, United States Code, to extend eligibility for automobile adaptive equipment to certain additional veterans.

summary.text: Directs the Administrator of Veterans' Affairs to provide automobile adaptive equipment to any veteran receiving compensation for ankylosis of one or both knees, or one or both hips, which resulted from an injury incurred or disease contracted in or aggravated by active military, naval, or air service during World War II or thereafter.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 1902 of title 38, United States Code, to extend eligibility for automobile adaptive equipment to certain additional veterans.
